translation: "I am wealthy and born into a noble family. Who is my equal? I shall perform sacrifices, give charity, and rejoice," thus deluded by ignorance.
commentary: 16.15 Rich rich? wellborn wellborn? I am (I) am? Who who? Another else? Is there is? Similar to eal? Maya to me? yaksye (I) will sacrifice? I will give (I) will give? I will rejoice (I) will rejoice? It is thus? They are deluded by ignorance.Commentary Kubera (the god of wealth) may be wealthy? but he cannot be compared with me. Even Vishnu Himself does not possess the wealth that I possess. In comparison with
